welcome:
💠 *Welcome to the TelegramEDT bot !* 💠
🔹Please use setedt to set your calendar
🔹Use notif to configure events notification
ℹAnd /help for more commands
help:
ℹ *Commands help* ℹ
📅edt, show your next events
🔔notif, set your events notifications
⚙setedt, set your calendar
📤	/getedt to show your ressource
edt_err_set:
Your EDT is not set ! ❌
ℹUse setedt to fix that
edt_err_choice:
Invalid choice ! ❌
ℹYou can choose between: `day`, `next`, `week`, `next week`
setedt_err_res:
Invalid resources ! ❌
ℹPut your resources number or a export url/QR code of your calendar
setedt_wait: Send a QR code, resource number or the url of the calendar !
kfet_prb: ⚠Your command got a problem, go check whats happening
settomuss_wait: Send the RSS feed link of your Tomuss !
